text: 14.10 Stt 19.24, Sng 11.6, 75.8, Ais 51.17, Jer 25.15, Ese 38.22, Lep 15.7, 16.19, 18.6, 19.20, 20.10, 21.8 God kɨlop nɨŋɨd nop mɨlɨk yɨbɨl yownɨgab agak. Yapek, ñɨg wayn sɨlek yɨbɨl ak, kɨnag kɨlop ayaŋ pagek aplan jakek, ñek ñɨnɨgabal agak. Ñɨg wayn sɨlek anɨb ak, God mɨlɨk yownɨgab ak agak. Ensel suŋtep ne okok sek, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak sek nɨg yelaknɨŋ, kɨlop mab yɨneb ak agyokek, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ kab salpa sek ak kɨlop yɨnaknɨŋ wɨg pak yenɨgabal agak.
